name: CONSULTING ENGINEERS, INC. and Paul K. Goldberg, Appellants, v. INSURANCE COMPANY OF NORTH AMERICA, Selective Way Insurance Company and Lucjan Zlotnicki and Andrei Neuman, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Consulting Engineers, Inc. v. Insurance Co. of North America

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: CONSULTING ENGINEERS, INC. and Paul K. Goldberg, Appellants, v. INSURANCE COMPANY OF NORTH AMERICA, Selective Way Insurance Company and Lucjan Zlotnicki and Andrei Neuman, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 19th day of January, 2000, the decision of the Superior Court is affirmed on the basis of its opinion. Consulting Engineers, Inc. v. Insurance Company of North America, 710 A.2d 82 (Pa.Super.1998).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Stephen J. Springer, Philadelphia, for Consulting Engineers, Inc. and Paul K. Goldberg.
Andrew L. Braunfeld, Norristown, for Insurance Co. of North America.
Andrew J. Gallogly, Philadelphia, for Selective Way Ins. Co.
Alexander K. Palamarchuk, Trevose, for Lucjan Zlotnicki and Andrei Neuman.
casebody.head_matter:
743 A.2d 911
CONSULTING ENGINEERS, INC. and Paul K. Goldberg, Appellants, v. INSURANCE COMPANY OF NORTH AMERICA, Selective Way Insurance Company and Lucjan Zlotnicki and Andrei Neuman, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 19, 2000.
Stephen J. Springer, Philadelphia, for Consulting Engineers, Inc. and Paul K. Goldberg.
Andrew L. Braunfeld, Norristown, for Insurance Co. of North America.
Andrew J. Gallogly, Philadelphia, for Selective Way Ins. Co.
Alexander K. Palamarchuk, Trevose, for Lucjan Zlotnicki and Andrei Neuman.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
